snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey handily won re-election on Tuesday, and will continue his victory lap with an appearance on four of this week’s Sunday shows. Some Republicans are looking to the governor as the future of their party, especially...
abstract: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey handily won re-election on Tuesday, and will continue his victory lap with an appearance on four of this week’s Sunday shows. Some Republicans are looking to the governor as the future of their party, especially after such a strong win in a Democratic state.
